Divine Love.quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it. (Mathnawi)

Spiritual Journey.quote: What you seek is seeking you. (Diwan-e Shams-e Tabrizi)

Mystical Union.quote: I am not this hair, I am not this skin, I am the soul that lives within. (Masnavi)

Inner Wisdom.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Divine Unity.quote: Not Christian or Jew or Muslim, not Hindu, Buddhist, Sufi or Zen. Not any religion or cultural system. I am not from the East or the West... My place is placeless, a trace of the traceless. (Diwan-e Shams)

Spiritual Dance.quote: Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free. (Mathnawi)

Divine Presence.quote: Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open? (Masnavi)

Heart Wisdom.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Soul Journey.quote: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing, there is a field. I'll meet you there. (Masnavi)

Divine Silence.quote: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Spiritual Liberation.quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life? (Diwan-e Shams)

Divine Grace.quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy. (Mathnawi)

Mystical Knowledge.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along. (Masnavi)

Inner Light.quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth. (Masnavi)

Divine Friendship.quote: Be with those who help your being. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Spiritual Transformation.quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames. (Diwan-e Shams)

Sacred Poetry.quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words. (Masnavi)

Divine Reflection.quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself. (Mathnawi)

Mystical Path.quote: What you are seeking is seeking you. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Heart Knowledge.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do. (Masnavi)

Divine Intoxication.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone. (Diwan-e Shams)

Spiritual Practice.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Love's Wisdom.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything. (Mathnawi)

Inner Journey.quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life. (Masnavi)

Divine Mystery.quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment. (Diwan-e Shams)

Soul Connection.quote: The garden of the world has no limits, except in your mind. (Mathnawi)

Spiritual Love.quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. (Fihi Ma Fihi)

Divine Wisdom.quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion. (Masnavi)

Mystical Vision.quote: Close your eyes, fall in love, stay there. (Diwan-e Shams)

Heart's Journey.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. (Mathnawi)
